text: Loisey is a commune in the Meuse department in Grand Est in north-eastern France. Between 1973 and 2014 it was part of the commune Loisey-Culey.INSEE The Encyclopédiste Charles Millot was priest of Loisey from 1743 to 1769. ==See also== *Communes of the Meuse department ==References== Category:Communes of Meuse (department)
title: Loisey
